creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract diagram-like image; two grey diamonds with purple rectangle between them, with "a", "b", and "c" on different sides; black parenthesis shapes on either side of diamonds; salmon-colored toned ground; blue wavy horizon line; whit rectangle in URC labelled "A."; orange and blue squares in LLC labelled "B." and "C."; looping horizontal spiral at top
title: Untitled
